mapper.update: update pf_bas_constructioninfo set AUDIT_DATE = sysdate, updated_by=#{username}, date_updated=sysdate where tag_head_id = #{tagHeadId} and pf_source_id = #{pfSourceId} and construction_status in (1, 2) and is_deleted = 0

update pf_bas_constructioninfo set ACCEPT_DATE = sysdate, accept_by = #{username}, accept_result = #{acceptResult}, updated_by=#{username}, date_updated=sysdate where tag_head_id = #{tagHeadId} and pf_source_id = #{pfSourceId} and construction_status = 6 and is_deleted = 0
mapper.select:
select rownum num,s.Full_Name,p.MN,p.IP_ADDRESS IpAddress,p.ACQUISITION_BRAND Brand_Name, p.collect_id,p.collect_id checkPointId,p.source_id,p.full_name checkpoint_Name,p.full_name Collect_Name, p.checkpoint_type,p.is_online,p.Check_Date,p.is_deleted,p.created_by,p.updated_by, p.date_created,p.date_updated,p.longitude,p.latitude,s.town_name townName,dc.construction_unit constructionUnit from Bas_CheckPoint p left join pf_bas_source s on p.SOURCE_ID = s.SOURCE_ID and s.is_deleted=0 left join basecenter.PF_BAS_CONSTRUCTIONINFO dc on s.source_id = dc.pf_source_id and dc.is_deleted=0 where p.IS_DELETED = 0 and dc.tag_head_id = 1012
and s.Full_Name like '%'||#{fullName}||'%'
and p.MN like '%'||#{mn}||'%'
and p.FULL_NAME like '%'||#{checkPointName}||'%'
and p.CheckPoint_Type like '%'||#{checkPointType}||'%'
and p.ACQUISITION_BRAND like '%'||#{brandName}||'%'
and s.SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId}
and s.town_code = #{townCode}
and dc.construction_unit like '%'||#{constructionUnit}||'%'
${dataScope} ORDER BY p.date_created DESC
mapper.insert:
select seq_construction_return.nextval as returnId from DUAL
insert into pf_bas_construction_return
return_id, pf_source_id, tag_head_id, construction_status, return_result, return_reason, contact_name, contact_phone, memo, created_by, date_created
#{returnId}, #{sourceId}, #{tagHeadId}, 6, #{returnResult}, #{returnReason}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{memo}, #{createdBy}, SYSDATE
mapper.select: select return_id,pf_source_id,tag_head_id,construction_status,return_reason,contact_name,contact_phone,memo,date_created, u.nick_name created_by from pf_bas_construction_return cr left join sys_user u on to_char(cr.created_by) = to_char(u.user_name) where pf_source_id = #{sourceId} and tag_head_id = #{tagHeadId} ORDER BY date_created desc
